verbs.description: A new superintendent [V: has] been named for Yellowstone National Park after his predecessor said he was being forced out by the Trump administration . The Department of Interior announced Wednesday that Cameron " Cam " Sholly will replace Dan Wenk , who had been superintendent since 2011 . Wenk planned to retire next March but was told he needed to be gone by August following disagreements with Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke over the park 's bison herds .
